Who we are

We are an independent news agency. Our first office opened on May 10, 2019. We cover news from various areas, such as music, anime, cartoons, art, science, etc. We also interview various interesting people from different cities and countries of the world. We do not deal with political news and news related to various tragic situations.


Positive news is our feature. Reading us you can not worry about the spoiled mood. Only useful and interesting information. We also hold live journalism training events every weekend. You can work with us. Positive and good!

Partners

Our partners are companies of different directions. Starting from our colleagues and ending with scientific communities. Our partners are also located in different countries of the world, cooperating and investing in our future.


Future Science, Disney, Coca Cola, McDonalds are our largest investor companies. As well as cookAndGood, news365, sea100, spaceProduction, MadeAnimation.

Our offices

Our offices are located in New York, Los Angeles. You can come to them to get to the casting to work for us.


We are waiting for you! Come and start your journey as a journalist with us! Positive and good!
